source:
def gradientDescent(x, y, theta, alpha, m, numIterations):
    xTrans = x.transpose()
    for i in range(0, numIterations):
        hypothesis = np.dot(x, theta)
        loss = hypothesis - y
        gradient = np.dot(xTrans, loss) / m
        theta = theta - alpha * gradient
    return theta

def dataFormat(house, numOfRows):
    x = np.zeros(shape=(numOfRows, 2))
    y = np.zeros(shape=numOfRows)
    return x, y

x, y = dataFormat(house,len(house))
m, n = np.shape(x)
numIterations= 100
alpha = 0.001
theta = np.ones(n)
theta = gradientDescent(x, y, theta, alpha, m, numIterations)
print(theta)

plt.scatter(house.tax,house.medv)
plt.title("Taxation vs Median income")
plt.xlabel("Taxation")
plt.ylabel('Median income')
plt.plot([1,700],[getY(0,theta),getY(50, theta)])
